ai-kv22.3:1.1_0: he stands unperturbed, he stands in the imperturbable.
ai-kv22.3:1.3_0: if he is not attaining Complete Emancipation, he is one who isn’t fully extinguished.
ai-kv22.3:1.5_0: and if he stands within a multitude, he says, “Oh, you have been extinguished.”
ai-kv22.3:1.6_0: “Absorbed in the imperturbable, he is extinguished.”
ai-kv22.3:2.1_0: he stands unperturbed, he stands in the imperturbable.
ai-kv22.3:2.3_0: In the Noble One who attains Nibbāna while standing in the mind,
ai-kv22.3:2.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv22.3:2.5_0: if he is not standing on the result; he does not attain Final Emancipation in the future.
ai-kv22.3:2.7_0: had an endeavourable to the result, he said,
ai-kv22.3:2.8_0: “Absorbed in the imperturbable, he is extinguished.”
ai-kv22.3:3.1_0: he stands unperturbed, he stands in the imperturbable.
ai-kv22.3:3.3_0: About overpowering in what is not the noble one who attains Nibbāna?
ai-kv22.3:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv22.3:3.5_0: isn’t this result in the future, thinking: ‘This unfinished mind is extinguished.’
ai-kv22.3:3.7_0: So he can be attained Nibbāna while standing, he surely will be extinguished, notoriously.
ai-kv22.3:3.8_0: “Absorbed in the imperturbable, he is extinguished.”
ai-kv22.3:4.1_0: he stands unperturbed, he stands in the imperturbable.
ai-kv22.3:4.3_0: Does the Buddha not burnt from the fourth absorption?
ai-kv22.3:4.5_0: emerging from the fourth absorption, having thus attained Nibbāna. (The king) did not say,
ai-kv22.3:4.6_0: “Absorbed in the imperturbable, he is extinguished.”
ai-kv22.3:4.7_0: The discussion on the imperturbable is finished.
